title: Will the Charlotte Hornets win the 2026 NBA Finals?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Charlotte Hornets win the 2026 NBA Finals. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

This market will resolve to “No” if it becomes impossible for this team to win the 2026 NBA Finals based off the rules of the NBA.

The resolution source for this market will be information from the NBA.
